products.title: Mustang
products.description: Replica of the iconic Mustang from Fast & Furious.

reviews.author: John Doe
reviews.comment: I recently purchased the Mustang for my nephew, and it's an absolute hit! Fantastic Toy - A Must-Have for child Everywhere

reviews.author: John Doe
reviews.comment: Worst toy ever seen. Wheels are rectangles. I can't imagine how to play with it.
